channel.title: I know its probably simple
channel.description:
Im sure its simple I just cannot think of what the problem is... it just slipped my mind. I was trying to give the dark bow a bit more umph than it had. before i got the error was also changing shop prices and Dragon arrows bonuses. i changed it all back that I know of but i still get this. [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:377) at server.world.ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:34) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:67) Press any key to continue . . .
[/code] Any ideas? (PI)

item.title: I know its probably simple
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

You’re supposed to use tabs inside of item.cfg when you modify it because of the \t in the strings.

Read full topic

item.title: I know its probably simple

item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

No problem i glad its working.

item.title: I know its probably simple
item.dc:creator: @Sup22211 Sup22211
item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

Try backup the current file (where you changed the bounses), backup it in another file and then check if the errors related to the file (the one with the bounses) then give me a replay here.

Read full topic

item.title: I know its probably simple
item.dc:creator: @League317 League317
item.description:
@League317 wrote:

Are you sure? i cant find where i have done that.

item.title: I know its probably simple
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

You pressed space instead of tab.
